snippet: The episode was not the only case of mistaken identity reported this week in connection with nationalist attacks.
lead_paragraph: The episode was not the only case of mistaken identity reported this week in connection with nationalist attacks.

headline.print_headline: Jewish Man Stabbed by Fellow Israeli in Botched Revenge Attack Denounces Ethnic Violence
headline.main: Jewish Man Stabbed by Fellow Israeli in Botched Revenge Attack Denounces Ethnic Violence
